sentences.en: A green manure is a crop grown mainly to improve soil fertility.
sentences.cn: 种植绿肥作物主要是为使土壤更加肥沃.

sentences.en: Doctors will tell you that pregnancy is the only sure test for fertility.
sentences.cn: 医生会告诉你怀孕是检测生育能力的唯一可靠方法。

sentences.en: It symbolizes growth, harmony, freshness, and fertility.
sentences.cn: 它是生长、和谐、新鲜和丰饶的象征。

sentences.en: One study showed that even as few as ten cigarettes a day can damage fertility.
sentences.cn: 一项研究显示，一天只抽10支烟也会损害生育能力。

sentences.en: She is taking drugs to increase her fertility.
sentences.cn: 她为了增强她的生殖能力而在服药.

sentences.en: She was unable to conceive a child naturally and was offered fertility treatment.
sentences.cn: 她因不能自然怀孕而接受受孕治疗.

sentences.en: Such soils vary in texture and fertility.
sentences.cn: 这种土壤的结构和肥沃度差异很大.

sentences.en: The abundance and availability of water and nutrients in a soil ecosystem determine its fertility.
sentences.cn: 土壤生态系统中水分和养分的丰度和有效性决定土壤的肥力.

sentences.en: The breast has always been a symbol of womanhood and ultimate fertility.
sentences.cn: 乳腺是女性性征和生育力的重要标志.

sentences.en: The farmers used manure to keep up the fertility of their land.
sentences.cn: 农夫们用粪保持其土质的肥沃.

sentences.en: The fertility of women who smoke is half that of non-smoking women.
sentences.cn: 吸烟女士的生育能力是不吸烟女士的一半。

sentences.en: The formation of aggregates is of prime importance to fertility.
sentences.cn: 团聚体的形式是土壤肥沃的首要条件.

sentences.en: The villagers took fertility symbols into the fields to ensure a good harvest.
sentences.cn: 农民们把丰产象征物拿到田里以确保好收成.

sentences.en: Their work includes the identification of genes which govern the growth rate and fertility.
sentences.cn: 他们的工作包括找出那些控制生长率和繁殖能力的基因。

sentences.en: There are obvious differences between clones with regard to their self - fertility.
sentences.cn: 自交能孕性在不同的无性系中是明显不同的.

sentences.en: This , of course, substantially impairs fertility.
sentences.cn: 这当然会使稔性受到极大损害.

words.tran_cn: 富饶的，肥沃的；能生育的
多产；[土壤]肥沃；[生物][生理][农经]生产力；丰饶

trans.tran_cn: 富饶，能生育性，可繁殖性，想象力丰富
trans.tran_en: the ability of the land or soil to produce good crops
